entry.title: Be My Breath (Through The Deep, Deep Water)
entry.summary:
Author: Autumn_Bitters (Winterlynne_Norvic)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,935Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Damian may be in love with him, but he does have enough respect for himself to not let that love continuously lead him blindly into more hurt and unfulfilled expectations. At least not today. Today he refuses to settle for this torture, because Damian does not want him for only a night. Nor a day. A week. A month. A year. Only forever will do, and forever does not sit behind that door. Forever will not come if he lets Richard kiss him, only to push Damian away any time a kiss might become more and he remembers his morals, or whatever his excuses are masquerading as. Damian is not a good person, but he is still a person. â€¦ Or, Dick and Damian leave behind the vigilante life to figure out who they are away from Gotham and five times Dick makes everything a lot more complicated between himself and Damian on their trip, plus one where they come back home and finally figure their shit out.

entry.title: Between Masks
entry.summary:
Author: AceofWeb

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,863Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 30

Summary: Written by the request of Cheerfully_Melancholly , this chapter follows Dick as he finally finds a moment alone in Wayne Manor, free from missions and expectations. What begins as a simple act of self-indulgence turns into something far more intimate, a quiet rebellion against the constant performance of being perfect. Alone, he confronts his reflection, his desires, and the body that has never fully felt like his own. For a brief, stolen moment, he allows himself to feel whole, to imagine being truly seen. But just as he begins to surrender to that fragile illusion, the sound of a doorknob turning reminds him that even in solitude, he is never truly free

entry.summary:
Author: Kaat30

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,523Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 54

Summary: Damian al Ghul became the Demon's head when he was 19 years old. He deemed Ra's and Talia unfit to rule the League of Assassins and disposed of them, starting a new era for the league with a ruthless leader at its head. Where Ra's had an obsession with Tim Drake, and Talia had an obsession with Bruce Wayne, Damian has his own obsession with a member of the Batfamily. Now Damian is 26 years old and on his way to Gotham to finally take what belongs to him, or rather, whom.

Summary: Richardâ€™s praises are not sparing. Theyâ€™re not doled out in piecemeal rations as his fatherâ€™s are. His praise is a feast, given freely to those who would partake. Each good job and amazing soaks into Damianâ€™s flesh and buries itself a home in between the curves of his rib cage. He admires Richard for his skill, for his talents and kindness. For his brutality when pushed against the wall. He admires his beauty and how much an honor it is to transcribe it to paper in whatever medium he can get his hands on. entry.summary:
Author: A_is_for_artificer

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,886Chapters: 2/8Kudos: 5

Summary: I don't want to tag the rapist like it's a relationship, so I'm not. --- Dick Grayson returns to Gotham where he faces a heart-wrenching family secret. Dick wants nothing more than to be there for Damian, but that might make him the very monster he wants to protect his little brother from. While Dick hides his mental spiraling for Damian's sake, Damian has a secret of his own that both excites and terrifies him. As they both grapple with a twisted legacy of shadows, their deepening bond becomes a joyful beacon that can heal them both. --- Chapter 1 opens with graphically depicted rape. entry.title: ACROSS THE BROKEN WORLDS
entry.summary:
Author: GoddessOfMischief61

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,397Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Who knew that what he had been searching for all his life would come from another universe?He had thought himself above such things above yearning, above weakness, above the gnawing ache of loneliness that crept in during the quiet hours of the night. He had forged himself into a weapon, a blade honed by shadows and sharpened by blood. But blades, no matter how flawless, still break.Then he saw him.Dick Grayson but not his Dick. Older, worn by battles Damian had never fought, softened by joy. Damian had never known. A man who carried light even through scars. It was infuriating. It was intoxicating. It was everything Damian had never allowed himself to want.
